name: TIME SOLDIERS
description:
Travel through historical eras such as "The Primitive Age", "The Age of Rome", "The World Wars", "The Age of Wars", and "The Future World" in order to rescue your fellow comrades in this top-down action shooter released by SNK in 1987.

* 2P gameplay / ad-hoc functionality is not available for this software



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
